title: Manual Product Information System in Hyundai Mobis
subTitle: Enhanced manual management with 'Modified Request' feature
overviewContent: Added a 'Modified Request' feature to the product information system to allow staff to copy existing manuals and make necessary edits. This reduced manual work and made updating product information faster and easier.

jd: Gathered user requirements to address manual copy-and-edit inefficiencies.
Developed the 'Modified Request' feature to copy existing manual data and edit it.
Updated the database to support the new functionality.
Performed unit and integration testing to ensure the feature worked correctly.
Created basic documentation for end users to use the new function.
